name: MetalNando
description:
Our Metal Head main character "Nando" is angry with all the "Fake" Portugal Regional Singers and wants a stand off with them, showing off what he thinks it's the true form of Music.

With small 2D platformer sessions on the way to fight the singers where the rhythm gameplay takes place.

Unfinished prototype with no real gameplay at all, just to show the general idea behind the concept.

Made in a collage course group in a couple of days.
